description: This file implements the backend APIs for managing UPnP (Universal Plug and Play) data models within a COSA (COmmon Service Architecture) framework. It provides functions for creating, initializing, and removing UPnP objects, leveraging internal data structures and external DML (Data Model Layer) functions.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE CosaUpnpCreate(VOID)
methods.description: Constructs and initializes a new COSA UPnP data model object, setting up pointers to create, initialize, and remove functions, and calling the internal initialization routine.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaUpnpInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the UPnP data model object, fetching device states and version info, and setting internal flags accordingly.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaUpnpRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Cleans up resources associated with the UPnP data model object and frees memory.
